constraints.name: difference_constraint
constraints.description: 区间内存在两个数，它们的差为给定值 x
constraints.formal: ∃ i, j ∈ [l, r] 使得 a[i] - a[j] = x

constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 区间内存在两个数，它们的和为给定值 x
constraints.formal: ∃ i, j ∈ [l, r] 使得 a[i] + a[j] = x

constraints.name: product_constraint
constraints.description: 区间内存在两个数，它们的乘积为给定值 x
constraints.formal: ∃ i, j ∈ [l, r] 使得 a[i] * a[j] = x

constraints.name: quotient_constraint
constraints.description: 区间内存在两个数，它们的商为给定值 x（没有余数）
constraints.formal: ∃ i, j ∈ [l, r] 使得 a[i] / a[j] = x 且 a[i] % a[j] = 0
